A search service is created with both,so if you added Azure Cognitive Search to your subscription, follow these steps to getthe necessary information:1. Sign in to the Azure portal, and in your search service Overview page, get theURL. An example endpoint might look like https://mydemo.search.windows.net.2. In Settings > Keys, get an admin key for full rights on the service.
There are twointerchangeable admin keys, provided for business continuity in case you need toroll one over.
